column4: my first ubuntu install, so i thought i'd install the kde and xfce desktops as well, to compare them. perhaps a bad idea, i settled on xfce as a preference and uninstalled gnome and kde but i still get the kubuntu desktop when i first boot
you mean you get the KUBUNTU splasg screen/logo?
thats just a image file its using.. its trivial and dosent mean much
i got a picture of my grandbaby there. :)
